    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testCurrentServersAreObserversInNextConfig()
      Reconfiguration recovery - current config servers discover .next file, but they're both observers and their ports change in next config.
      void testNextConfigAlreadyActive()
      Reconfiguration recovery - test that old config members will join the new config if its already active, and not try to complete the reconfiguration
      void testNextConfigCompletion()
      Reconfiguration recovery - test that a reconfiguration is completed if leader has .next file during startup and new config is not running yet
      void testNextConfigUnreachable()
      Reconfiguration recovery - test that if servers in old config have a .next file but no quorum of new config is up then no progress should be possible (no progress will happen to ensure safety as the new config might be actually up but partitioned from old config)

      • Methods inherited from class org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.QuorumPeerTestBase

        process

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • testCurrentServersAreObserversInNextConfig

        public void testCurrentServersAreObserversInNextConfig()
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Reconfiguration recovery - current config servers discover .next file, but they're both observers and their ports change in next config. Suppose that next config wasn't activated yet. Should complete reconfiguration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testNextConfigUnreachable

        public void testNextConfigUnreachable()
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Reconfiguration recovery - test that if servers in old config have a .next file but no quorum of new config is up then no progress should be possible (no progress will happen to ensure safety as the new config might be actually up but partitioned from old config)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                 throws java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
